item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-07-14
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at FedEx Office Print & Ship Center (1244 Boylston Street, Holly Ln, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Trying out @crowdflower for the first time. I have to say it's pretty odd having hundreds of minions at my beck and call. I like it! #

Powered by Twitter Tools
